title: Link compilers and libraries with Visual Studio
body: I would be pretty great if we could use the bash terminal as a package manager and terminal but also have the Visual Studio IDE plugged into that as well. So instead of compiling with clang we could use GCC and such.

comments.body: I was succesfull in compilng some open source game in a matter of hours (https://wl.widelands.org/wiki/BuildingWidelandsWIN10/) but then found that I have a binary thats not windows 10 native.
